text: Capensibufo is a genus of true toads with only two species. The common English name is Cape Toads. They live in the Republic of South Africa from Breede River to north of Knysna, Western Cape Province. ==Species== Binomial Name and Author Common Name Capensibufo rosei Rose's Mountain Toad Capensibufo tradouwi Tradouw Mountain Toad == Other websites == * . 2007.
